page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content:
WITH MY FRIEND. 7.40 TOOK BEVERLY HOME TO BURRINGTON 8.32 WENT TO BED.
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A FARMER 7.00 GOT UP AND HAD CUP OF TEA 7.15 FETCHED COW FOR ARTIFICIAL INSEMINATION 7.45 GATHERED SHEEP FOR HATHERLEIGH MARKET 9.00 LEFT FOR MARKET WITH 21 DRAFT EWES NOT FIT FOR BREEDING 10.00 WENT TO MARKET WITH TWO MORE LOADS OF SHEEP HAD FIVE MINUTES FOR BREAKFAST 2.45 ARRIVED HOME FROM MARKET FOR LATE DINNER 3.30 ATTACHED HAY TURNER TO TRACTOR AND SCATTERED GRASS THAT HAD BEEN CUT FOR HAY 5.30 TEA 6.00 MILKED NEIGHBOURS COWS FOR HIM TO CONTINUE SILAGE MAKING 8.00 REPAIRED BALE SLEDGE AND SHEARED SHEEP 9.30 SUPPER 10.30 BED
